- [93mOlefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m of [93mphospholipids[0m by [93mRuthenium[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcatalysts[0m in [93msolution[0m and on [93mliposomes[0m under [93mbiologically[0m [93mrelevant[0m [93mconditions[0m.: The [93mlast[0m [93mdecade[0m [93mhas[0m [93mseen[0m a [93mlot[0m of [93minterest[0m in [93mclassical[0m [93morganometallic[0m [93mcatalysis[0m [93mperformed[0m [93mintracellularly[0m, or at [93mleast[0m under [93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m ([93m37[0m °[93mC[0m, [93mair[0m, [93mwater[0m). [93mOne[0m [93msuch[0m [93mclassical[0m [93mreaction[0m is [93molefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m ([93mOM[0m), which is [93mextremely[0m [93mcommon[0m in [93mpreparative[0m [93morganic[0m [93mchemistry[0m, [93mhowever[0m under [93mnon[0m-[93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m ([93mesp[0m. [93morganic[0m [93msolvents[0m). This [93mwork[0m [93mfocuses[0m on the [93mquestion[0m [93mwhether[0m [93mOM[0m is [93mcatalysed[0m in [93mmembranes[0m [93mcontaining[0m [93munsaturated[0m [93mphospholipids[0m. [93mInitial[0m [93mexperiments[0m with the [93m2nd[0m [93mgeneration[0m [93mHoveyda[0m-[93mGrubbs[0m [93mcatalyst[0m ([93mHGII[0m) [93mshowed[0m [93mself[0m-[93mmetathesis[0m of the [93mmembrane[0m-[93mforming[0m [93mphospholipids[0m [93mPOPE[0m, [93mPOPC[0m, and [93mPOPG[0m, while [93mapproximating[0m [93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m in [93msolution[0m ([93m37[0m °[93mC[0m, [93mair[0m, [93mneutral[0m [93mpH[0m) with [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversions[0m up to [93m58[0m%. [93mSubsequent[0m [93mexperiments[0m with [93mDOPC[0m in [93mlarge[0m [93munilamellar[0m [93mvesicles[0m ([93mLUVs[0m) and in [93msolution[0m [93mincluded[0m a [93mPEGylated[0m ([93mfeaturing[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mwater[0m [93msolubility[0m) and a [93mpalmitoylated[0m (with [93mincreased[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mmobility[0m) [93mHGII[0m [93mderivative[0m. [93mBoth[0m were [93msuccessfully[0m [93msynthesised[0m [93mbeforehand[0m and [93mcomprehensively[0m [93mcharacterized[0m. [93mMembrane[0m [93mlocalisation[0m of the [93mcatalysts[0m was [93mevaluated[0m [93mvia[0m [93msize[0m [93mexclusion[0m [93mchromatography[0m ([93mSEC[0m) [93mfollowed[0m by [93mICP[0m-[93mMS[0m. [93mProduct[0m [93manalysis[0m of [93mOM[0m was [93mcarried[0m out after [93mone[0m [93mhour[0m and [93m24[0m [93mh[0m, [93mrespectively[0m, [93mvia[0m [93mNMR[0m, [93mTLC[0m, and [93mLC[0m-[93mMS[0m. The [93mintra[0m- and [93mintermolecular[0m [93mOM[0m [93mproducts[0m of [93mDOPC[0m were [93midentified[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversion[0m was [93msignificantly[0m [93mdiminished[0m in the [93mvesicles[0m, [93mhowever[0m, the [93mequilibrium[0m [93mstate[0m in [93mvesicles[0m was [93mreached[0m in [93mmuch[0m [93mless[0m [93mtime[0m [93mcompared[0m to [93msolution[0m ([93m1[0m [93mh[0m in [93mvesicles[0m [93mvs[0m. [93m24[0m [93mh[0m in [93msolution[0m).
